full_output.summary: A passionate computer science engineer seeking opportunities in the domains of cyber security, data scientist and analyst, blockchain technology, artificial intelligence and machine learning, software development, and web development. I have interested in developing various projects in the above areas of expertise during my academic curriculum I have developed various projects and participated in various national and international completion and I have firm believe that knowledge and skills learnt while doing academic project can bring significant value addition in the organization.

projects.name: Brain Tumor Detection Using MRI Images
projects.description: Developed a Working Model of android application and web Application which detects tumor using MRI Images using python that provides Python libraries like TensorFlow, Keras provide pre-built CNN architectures and tools for building Data Sets to Identify Brain Tumor from the Uploaded Image.

projects.description: Proficient in leveraging Solidity blockchain technology for event organization, ensuring enhanced transparency, security, and automation in the planning and management of diverse events. Experience in creating smart contracts for ticketing, payments, and data management, delivering a reliable and efficient event experience for both organizers and participants.

Whether it's sourcing data from the public web, formulating equations or SQL queries, or generating alternative terms for columns, leveraging AI accelerates and ensures accuracy in completing tasks efficiently.
